ood morning sir,

I am having a little challenge

A Pastor was moved from one Area (Life Abundance) to another area (Arise and Shine) - all approved by principal officers but the phone number of the Pastor is tagged with another Pastors name.

The pastor's name is George Arueyingho and his phone number (08023077944) is tagged with Pastor Mrs Adeleye Deborah and he is still reflecting in his old Area. 

This Pastor is yet to input remittance. 

Kindly assist

Ogun 30 Admin
